product_name: Patagonia Knifeblade Pullover Soft-Shell Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Patagonia Knifeblade Pullover Soft-Shell Jacket is a highly water-resistant performance-stretch soft shell, built with lightweight, moisture-shedding Polartec(R) fabric. Polartec(R) Power Shield(R) Pro fabric with a tricot backing combines lightweight weather resistance and generous breathability. Pullover silhouette trims weight and bulk for use with a climbing harness or pack waistbelt. Helmet-compatible, 2-way-adjustable hood with laminated visor for optimal visibility in bad conditions. Embedded cord locks in hood and hem for quick adjustments. Full-reach gusseted underarm panels allow overhead mobility without lifting the jacket. 2 vertical chest pockets have reverse-coil zippers with a durable water repellent finish. Patagonia Knifeblade Pullover Soft-Shell Jacket for men has adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs with pleated gusset. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Patagonia Knifeblade Pullover Soft-Shell Jacket is a highly water-resistant performance-stretch soft shell, built with lightweight, moisture-shedding Polartec(R) fabric.
